snippet.title: [x68000] Hard Battle - Longplay
snippet.description:
Hard Battle is a bizzarre shooter for the sharp x68000 where the main ship is the 68k itself,  your weapon are floppy disks ,your enemies are other japanese computers, and backgrounds are electronic circuits.
This game has only one level, and it is not particularly exciting. 
A better version of this game exists, called hard battle plus , you can find more information here http://ameblo.jp/koorogiyousyoku/entry-11904400365.html
